params.text: Leo Ni siku gani?
Habari ya asubuhi! Bea ana furaha sana leo.
Lazima kuna jambo la kushangaza linamsubiri.
Oh! Hakuna jambo la kushangaza? Kila mtu yuko wapi?
“Mama, unajua leo ni siku gani?” Bea aliuliza. “Leo ni siku ya kupika,” Mama alimjibu. Oh hapana! Mama alikuwa amesahau!
“Dada, unajua leo ni siku gani?” Bea aliuliza. “Leo ni siku ya kuchora,” dada yake alisema. Bea alijiuliza ni kwanini dada yake hakumbuki.
“Mdogo wangu, leo ni siku gani?” Bea aliuliza. “Mpira! Mpira!” mdogo wake alisema.
Labda marafiki zake Bea wangekumbuka!
“Sungura, leo ni siku gani?” Bea aliuliza. “Leo ni siku ya kushona,” Sungura alisema.
“Swala, leo ni siku gnai?” Bea aliuliza. “Leo ni siku ya mavuno,” Swala alijibu. Bea alianza kuhisi huzuni.
Nyani alisema ni siku ya kuchuma matunda. Chura akasema ni siku ya kuimba. Tembo akasema ni siku ya kusoma kitabu.
Hakuna aliyekumbuka kuwa leo ni siku maalum ya Bea!
Bea ana huzuni na amechoka.
Heri ya Siku ya Kuzaliwa, Bea!
Ukweli ni kwamba, kila mtu alikuwa anakumbuka! Bea anafurahi sana.

“Leo Ni siku gani?” credits

This work, “Leo Ni siku gani?” is a derivative of Hari Apakah Ini? (What Day Is It?), Author: Vannia Rizky Santoso. Illustrator: Vannia Rizky Santoso. Published by The Asia Foundation - Let's Read, https://www.letsreadasia.org © The Asia Foundation - Let's Read. Released under CC BY-NC 4.0.

“Leo Ni siku gani?” is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.

Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
